items.title: Global shares decline as tensions simmer in the Middle East
items.description: Shares have retreated in Europe and Asia as worries persist about conflict in the Middle East

items.title: Rebuilding one of the nation's oldest Black churches to begin at Juneteenth ceremony
items.description: A groundbreaking is scheduled in Virginia for the rebuilding of one of the nation’s oldest Black churches

items.title: 2 men get life sentences in shooting death of 11-year-old outside stadium
items.description: Two men have been sentenced to lifelong terms in prison in the shooting death of an 11-year-old boy outside an Albuquerque baseball stadium in 2023 th...

items.title: Hundreds gather to remember slain Minnesota lawmaker and husband
items.description: Hundreds have gathered outside Minnesota’s Capitol for a vigil to remember a prominent state lawmaker and her husband gunned down at their home

items.title: Winning numbers drawn in Wednesday’s Powerball
items.description: The winning numbers in Wednesday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 23-29-50-64-67, Powerball: 11
